Html:
If I run the applicaiton from within the Visual Studio 2013 everything is fine. If I double-click the exe from outside the IDE, Windows throws errors and shuts down. At the begining, I though, what problem related with my added code, but it doesn`t.

Then I created completely new Modern UI project, but it have the same problem. Does anyone have same problem?
I do not have this problem. I have VS 2013 professional and I can execute my exe from outside the IDE with no errors what-so-ever.
Yes, you right, I just successfully runned exe from bin/release folder.
